tool_description: This API helps you to query website traffic and key metrics for any website, including engagement rate, traffic ranking, keyword ranking and traffic source... to create a plugin like similarweb.com
title: Similar Web

api_list.name: countries/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://similar-web.p.rapidapi.com/countries/list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "similar-web.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you list all the countries available in the Similar Web database?
Show me the list of countries supported by Similar Web.
What countries does Similar Web provide data for?
Provide a list of countries that Similar Web tracks.
Give me the complete list of countries available in Similar Web.
List all the countries that Similar Web has data on.
Can you display the countries that Similar Web monitors?
What are the countries included in Similar Web's database?
Show me the countries that Similar Web covers.
List the countries that Similar Web provides insights for.

api_list.name: get-analysis
api_list.description: Get website traffic, key metrics, including engagement rate, traffic ranking, keyword ranking and traffic source.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Any site or domain that you are familiar with. Ex : amazon.com

utterances.utterance: What is the traffic ranking for amazon.com?
